full_title: Hey, Cruel World... by Marilyn Manson
title: Hey, Cruel World...
lyrics:
Hey, cruel world
You don't have what it takes
We don't need your faith
We've got fucking fate

Hey, cruel world
You don't have what it takes
We don't need your faith
We've got fucking fate

Creator, preserver, destroyer
Ask which one I am
There's no drugged-out devils
Or square-halo angels walking among us


I am among no one
I am among no one
I am among no one
No one


Hey, cruel world
You don't have what it takes
We don't need your faith
We've got fucking fate
Fate, fate, fate


The center of the universe cannot exist
When there are no, no edges
The center of the universe cannot exist
When there are no, no edges


Hey, cruel world
You don't have what it takes
We don't need your faith
We've got fucking fate
